segments.text: I'm famished ! Let's get some grub !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm in the mood for some chips and salsa .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Me , too ! The chips here are so light and crispy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And they have tangy , freshly-made salsa , too . My mouth is watering already !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'll go get the chips . What do you want to drink ?
segments.speaker: S1
